003892BF.desc: Casting {c_important}Fireball{/c} or {c_important}Meteor{/c} increases the Critical Strike Chance of further casts of that Skill by {c_number}[{SF_0} * 100|%+|]{/c} for {c_number}{SF_2}{/c} seconds, up to {c_number}[{SF_0} * {SF_1} * 100|%+|]{/c}. Additional stacks do not refresh this timer.
